subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson, who was four-over-par in the first round on Thursday, did not play in a PGA Tour event last week, as he prefers to do the week before a major tournament.
snippet: Phil Mickelson, who was four-over-par in the first round on Thursday, did not play in a PGA Tour event last week, as he prefers to do the week before a major tournament.
